Comment.value:
Skills

Animal Empathy :
Rangers with 30 base skill points of animal empathy replace their animal companion with a clone of themselves.  The animal companion's name and appearance are retained. 

Craft Armor :
For every 40 points of craft armor, characters receive +1 to their Armor Class. This does not count towards the +20 cap.

Craft Weapon :
For every 40 points of craft weapon, characters receive +1 to their Attack Bonus. This does not count towards the +20 cap. 

Parry :
For every 1 point of parry skill characters receive 1% immunity to critical hits up to a maximum of 50%. This does not require the use of the Parry attack mode. 

Tumble:
AC Bonus from tumble skill is now capped at +12 minus the AC bonuses received from PM and RDD level with a minimum of +6. I.e. RDD and PM will always get more AC from 30 or less tumble 

Ride:
Beyond meeting the requirements for Purple Dragon Knight this skill serves no purpose.
